TC_CART_01.test_case_summary: Verify that added products are visible in the Cart
TC_CART_01.prerequisites: 1. User should have added 'iphone 13 pro' to cart

steps.test_step: 1. Click on 'Cart' button in the header
steps.expected_result: User should be redirected to the Cart page
'iphone 13 pro' should be visible in the cart list
